ESRS for financial institutions to support them in financing the transition according to the ‘green
deal.’
ESRS 1 paragraph 35 states: ‘If the undertaking omits the information prescribed by a datapoint
that derives from other EU legislation listed in Appendix B of ESRS 2, it shall explicitly state that
the information in question is “not material”.’
Compilation of Explanations January—November 2024 Page 107 of 278
